summary: A follower mod tribute to Jessica Alba (CBBE, UNP, UNPB and BBP options)
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an update of Omega99jp's excellent [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27955]Lovely Jessica - Standalone[/url] follower mod, a tribute to the beautiful Jessica Alba.  If you're in a real hurry, please at least read the [color=#ff7700]orange [/color]words below.

The meshes are are all borrowed from Omega and others credited below, but I spent a lot of time updating the textures used in this mod. I also tweaked Jessica's attributes. In this mod, [color=#ff7700]she is a dual-wielding rogue[/color] and prefers light armor. By the time Jessica reaches level 81, however, she will have mastered seven skills, including the "offense skills" One-handed, Archery, Conjuration and Destruction.  As these secondary skills develop, she will be more likely to conjure something and let it "tank" your opponent while she stands back an blasts it with thunderbolts and shoots arrows at it (though this obviously depends on what weapons, spells and enchantments you've given her).

Note that there are only a limited number of readily available vanilla Skyrim weapons that NPCs can use in their off-hand for dual-wielding: a Forsworn Sword, a Forsworn Axe, or a Pickaxe. To supplement these, there is a very small barrel (perhaps twice the size of a salt shaker :)) on a table in the Winking Skeever (where she can be found initially) that will have a [color=#ff7700]leveled off-hand dagger[/color] that Jessica can use. She will also reset with a leveled off-hand dagger and sword if you select [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO's[/url] "you could dress better" option.

This mod is [color=#ff7700]standalone[/color] - it does not require any additional mods. I recommend uninstalling Omega99jp's original mod if you want to use this one as it will overwrite some of that mod's assets. (But please endorse his mod if you haven't already.)

Update: I finally finished and got the permissions to release a version using the [color=#ff7700]UNP[/color] body. (Thanks to AncientRome for the screenshots of UNP Jessica in the user images section!) I did not include the armor that is in the CBBE version, but I did include her clothes (her default outfit). She does not look as slim in the clothes as she actually is. If that's the look you're going for, you may want to try other UNP clothes/armors on her. I tested West Wind Assault UNP armor and she looked pretty good. I strongly recommend that you avoid armors that do not support the weight-slider on UNP Jessica.

This mod does NOT like [color=darkorange]pirated[/color] versions of Skyrim.  Don't bother posting complaints about this.  Spend the money to buy a legit copy of the game.

[url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/9005524-kalyssa01/]Kalyssa01[/url] has posted a [color=#ff7700]French [/color]translation of this mod here: [url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/personnages/compagnons/lovely_jessica_redux]link[/url].  Also, Emma has posted a patch that gives her[color=#ff7700] Vilja [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]in Skyrim [/url][/color]follower the facial appearance of Lovely Jessica Redux.


[color=darkorange][b]Optional Files[/b]

If you install any of the following overwrites with Nexus Mod Manager, you must select "NO" when it asks if you want to upgrade the mod.[/color]

If you are having any trouble with this mod and you use the English version of Skyrim, try to overwrite the esp with the [color=darkorange]"troubleshooting patch."[/color] This patch places Jessica in the [color=darkorange]Moorside Inn[/color] in Morthal rather than the [color=darkorange]Winking Skeever[/color]. This patch does NOT include the armor. It should work for either version (UNP or CBBE).

If you prefer [color=darkorange]no tattoos[/color] on Jessica, DL the optional file and overwrite the texture from main mod.

I have added files to support the UNPB body. Download the UNP main file and overwrite with the UNPB optional file. I have also added meshes supporting [color=darkorange]BBP for CBBE and UNPB[/color]. Again, download one main file (CBBE or UNP, respectively) and overwrite with these optional BBP meshes. Note that the BBP files will only work for Jessica if you have already installed a BBP "system" (skeleton, animations and armors).


[color=darkorange][b]Credits/Thanks[/b][/color]

Omega99jp for the original mod (used with permission).

FYI for beta testing the CBBE version and AncientRome for extensive testing of the UNP version.

This mod includes a slightly "standard definition" version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060]Demon Hunter Armor - CBBEv3[/url] (used with permission). It also includes clothing from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5564]a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE[/url] (free to use). If you like these outfits, please go to BloodFree's and Cotyounoyume's mod pages to download the full versions and endorse them.

Undies in one image are from Gatti's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19257]Gatti 14 Yumiko Suits for CBBEv3[/url]. They are NOT included with this mod.

Certain textures are based in part on Hello Santa's work - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] (used with permission). Some of her textures were based on assets from by Maevan2 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC[/url] (also used with permission).

I also used textures from Alt3rn1ty's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30181]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url] (free to use), navetsea's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] (free to use) and BellaGail's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url] (free to use).

And of course Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE[/url] (used with permission), dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] (free to use) and xp32, Mr.Troublemaker and the Blessed Redux Project team for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] (free to use).

Tattoo designs are by http://quicksilverfury.deviantart.com/ (free to use), http://patrike.deviantart.com/ (used with permission) and http://lisamahphone.deviantart.com/ (also at http://www.ellefx.com) (used with permission).

Last, but certainly not least, Jessica's hair is based on the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] mod by Apachii.  Go endorse Apachii's work; Skyrim would be much bleaker without it.
author: geegee

files.fileName: No Tattoos Overwrite for CBBE version-40545-1-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
CHANGES IN VERSION 1.1:

Reduced height from 1.02 to 0.98.

Added custom combat style so she will be more likely to use ranged weapons and magic at higher levels.

New CBBE 3.2 meshes may help those who've had problems with first version.
